Articles.Content:
this is getting annoying... i'm spending more time posting here than actually playing the game ![-_-](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_sleep.png) (not even saying that my install is almost mods-free...)

**Specs :**

Windows 8.1

KSP 1.0.4 steam install

Intel i5 4450

....ty graphics card

8GB RAM

**Mods installed :**

Chatterer

Stock fairings fix

Kerbal Engineer Redux

Kerbal Alarm Clock

So i had a probe on a eccentrical orbit over jool, periapsis at about xxxkm.

When i got near the periapsis i couldn't timewarp anymore (although i was not in the atmosphere) and got the following message : "Cannot warp faster than 1x whiile the ship is under acceleration"

[![mini_683447Capturedcran94.png](http://img15.hostingpics.net/thumbs/mini_683447Capturedcran94.png)](http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=683447Capturedcran94.png)

[![mini_943059Capturedcran95.png](http://img15.hostingpics.net/thumbs/mini_943059Capturedcran95.png)](http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=943059Capturedcran95.png)

So i used the physics time warp instead for a minute or so, trying regular warp from time to time to see if it was working again...

Alt-tab-ed out of the game for a minute, and when i came back map view was black screen and flying view shows me only the skybox(no craft, no jool, no sun etc...)... No input is working except the pause menu and the timewarp. 

Also, my framerate dropped from 60 to 10 when this happened.

I also have the skybox-screen in the KSC view. No kerbin, no buildings.

Any ideas for a fix ? It is very irritating

I'm gonna try restarting the game now but i don't think that my progress will be saved...

EDIT : restarting the game has made the KSC, the solar system and my probe re-appear, however i am still getting the part where i cannot timewarp "because of acceleration". I don't see how my ship could be under acceleration since the engine is shut down, the reaction wheels and SAS are turned off, and there are no RCS.

The game isn't even letting me save and quit without losing my progression...

talk about a finished game...
